17.4. Model Evaluation 346
observations of power consumption to daily totals. This is not required, but makes sense, given
that we are interested in total power per day. We can achieve this easily using the resample()
function on the Pandas DataFrame. Calling this function with the argument ‘D’ allows the
loaded data indexed by date-time to be grouped by day (see all oﬀset aliases). We can then
calculate the sum of all observations for each day and create a new dataset of daily power
